result.stdout:
[RUN] Prsist Memory: Running 1 command(s)
--------------------------------------------------
[HELP] Prsist Memory System Commands:

  Core Operations:
  -t  Test system
  -s  Status/session info
  -c  Context (what Claude sees)
  -r  Recent sessions
  -h  Health check
  -m  Memory stats
  -v  Validate system

  Session Management:
  -n  New session (start)
  -e  End session
  -k  Checkpoint (create)
  -x  Export session data

  Data Management:
  -f  Feature log (interactive)
  -p  Project memory (add)
  -d  Decisions (add decision)
  -z  Cleanup old data

  Shortcuts:
  -a  All core checks (equivalent to -tschrmv)
  -l  List commands (this help)

Examples:
  prsist -t      (test system)
  prsist -hm     (health + memory stats)
  prsist -tsc    (test + status + context)
  prsist -a      (run all core checks)
  prsist -nf     (new session + feature log)
--------------------------------------------------
